title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When attempting to copy a package in version 2031 of the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' in the 'jdt.ui', selecting 'xxx' as the destination package leads to unexpected behavior.
OB: When selecting 'xxx' as the destination package for the copy operation, the software exhibits unexpected behavior.
EB: The expected behavior is that the destination should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of 'xxx' for the copy package operation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open version 2031 of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' in 'jdt.ui'.
2. Attempt to copy a package.
3. When prompted to select the destination package, choose 'xxx'.
